text: Arau yidina te'om sihamtaka ekatraita karaiba (se'i dina sihamtara ene lagiba yeniba prthiraita) kerala sihamtara arasthiti dinara muhurttakala matra achila; sihamte parasparaka cini paba. Arasye sihamta ksatigrasta haiche yisakale allahara saksatara bisaye micha araopa karaiche arau sihamta satpatha praapta nachila
